name: Recipe: Tandoori Roast Chicken
desc: A detailed step-by-step recipe for making Tandoori Roast Chicken.

value.text: World Quest The Gourmet Supremos: Cleanup

customize.name: Fowl
customize.desc: A fresh chunk of fowl. Handled properly, it can make a hearty meal.

customize.name: Rukkhashava Mushrooms
customize.desc:
[Version 1]

A fungus that grows in layers upon layers, like a sea of clouds, and which mostly grows on trees deep in the rainforest. Therefore, they are considered by the people of Sumeru to be the holy crystallization of Rukkhadevata's legacy.

[Version 2]

Complete Archon Quest Chapter III: Act V - Akasha Pulses, the Kalpa Flame Rises

Quest - Where the Boat of Consciousness Lies

A fungus that grows in layers upon layers, like a sea of clouds, and which mostly grows on trees deep in the rainforest.

customize.name: Padisarah
customize.desc: A holy and noble plant. The conditions for growth in its environment are very demanding. The flower buds can be processed to make valuable spices.

customize.name: Spice
customize.desc: A seasoning with varied flavors. It is made from dried Harra Fruits and can enrich the taste of a dish. Therefore, Sumeru locals say, "Spice goes well with anything."

customize.name: Tandoori Roast Chicken
customize.desc: A signature chicken dish of Sumeru. The chicken was first marinated with red spices, and then roasted in a tandoor. The process of making this Sumeru classic does not involve any fancy skills, and the use of such a humble clay oven might be surprising to some. In Sumeru, a tandoor to a veteran chef is as important as a trusty sword to an adventurer.
